name: Verify user is able to download issues pdf report

testSteps.description: 1: Verify user is able to download issues pdf report ({Store=UAE L2, Start Date=01-01-2022})

children.description: Given User is on home page of SMT application
And User is able to see login button on home page
Validate login button on home page
When User click on login button
And User click on Proceed To Login button in "English"
Click proceed to login button: English

userStory.narrative: We will be using this feature file for Reports functionality validations in SMT application mentioning all possible scenarios for Store Operator user.

title: Verify user is able to download issues pdf report
backgroundTitle: User login to SMT application and navigate to Reports tab

tags.name: Store operator/Reports tab in SMT application for Store Operator user
tags.displayName: Reports tab in SMT application for Store Operator user

scenarioOutline:
Given User click on "Issues" tab
And User type and select "<Store>" from "Store" in "Reports" tab
And User wait for "2" seconds
And User enter "<Start Date>" in "startDate"
And User click on "Generate Report" button
Then Reports Data is visible in table to user
And User click on Export Report button
And User wait for "2" seconds
And User click on Export PDF button
And User wait for "20" seconds
